title: Untitled Circle (Tris) Book
description: Tris enrolls at the mages' university in Lightsbridge under an assumed name, in an attempt to become an ordinary mage practicing normal academic magic (spells, charms, potions) with no one knowing her real name or power.What are you working on now/next?Tammy is currently polishing the first book in a new series about Numair/Arram Draper. Her next commitments are to books two and three, after which she will start work on a book in the Circle universe following Tris as she attempts to get her ordinary mageâ€™s credentials at Lightsbridge.
author: Tamora Pierce
